article_title: Bastrop County sets new breast-feeding policy
article_text:
Just One More Thing...

We have sent you a verification email. Please check your email and click on the link to activate your profile.

If you do not receive the verification message within a few minutes of signing up, please check your Spam or Junk folder.

Close

og.description: Bastrop County employees needing to pump breast milk or breastfeed during job hours will soon be able to take up to four paid breaks during the workday once a new policy is enacted next week.
og.title: Bastrop County sets new breast-feeding policy
